docs.lead_paragraph: Her voice breaking and eyes filling with tears, an unusually emotional Michelle Obama said Friday that being first lady "has been the greatest honor of my life" as she bid an early farewell to the White House.

docs.abstract: Op-Ed article by Janet Napolitano offers closer look at rational and lawful reasons behind Pres Obama's authorization of Deferred Action for Childhood Arrivals program, which she was closely involved in as secretary of Homeland Security Dept; argues there is no reason to abandon program now.

docs.lead_paragraph: Pledges by President Barack Obama and a national nonprofit organization to end homelessness among veterans did not meet their goal. But advocates see improvement, and the head of the Department of Veterans Affairs said Thursday that "we should be there" within a couple of years.

headline.main: As Obama Era Closes, Goal to End Veteran Homelessness Unmet
